title.narrative: Support for World Bank's DFGG Program

description.narrative: This initiative will support the following two activities within the World Bank’s Demand for Good Governance (DFGG) program: a) Support for the Arbitration Council Foundation (ACF) b) Support for the East Asia and Pacific Regional (DFGG) Facility. The first activity aims to strengthen, scale up, and improve the labour arbitration system, mechanics, and services in Cambodia. Funds will be provided to the ACF, a non-governmental organisation that is responsible for the managerial and technical functions of the Arbitration Council (AC) in Cambodia. These funds will allow the ACF to ensure the continuity of AC’s operations, its institutional integrity and effectiveness as a forum for labour dispute resolution. They will also enable the AC to expand its services to other geographic and economic sectors (beyond Phnom Penh, and into a broader range of industrial sectors); improve research and analytical capacity; and expand training, outreach and dissemination programs. The second activity
